__comment: Google Antigravity MCP Configuration for AIRIS MCP Gateway
__setup: 1. Ensure AIRIS MCP Gateway is running: docker compose ps
2. Copy this file to ~/.antigravity/mcp_config.json (or equivalent location)
4. Verify tools are loaded: airis-agent, context7, sequential-thinking, etc.

airis-gateway-core.description: AIRIS MCP Gateway (SSE transport) - 90% token reduction via schema partitioning

airis-agent.description: AIRIS Agent tools: confidence_check, deep_research, docs_optimize

airis-workspace.description: AIRIS Workspace: manifest sync, repo indexing, project structure

git.description: Git operations: status, diff, commit, push

memory.description: Short-term memory: knowledge graph for current session

sequential-thinking.description: Multi-step reasoning API for complex tasks

__optional_servers.__comment: Enable by removing '__' prefix from server name

args: docker run --rm -i --network airis-mcp-gateway_default -v ~/projects:/workspaces/projects:rw ghcr.io/oraios/serena:latest serena start-mcp-server --context ide-assistant --enable-web-dashboard false --enable-gui-log-window false
